Name: Mathew Tyler
Age: 15
Height: 5'4
Weight: 9 stone 2 lbs (130lbs)
Hair: Short brown hair
Skin:Tan/pale
Brief bio: Mathew, or Matt/Matty as he is known by his friends, is a fairly outgoing 15 year old boy who although accepting of his sexually is not public about it, close friends know. At the average height for his age he has a average build with an average amount of flab on it, going about an inch over his trousers when seated. Although he is not "fat" he is regularity talking about how fat he is when ever the top can arise, be it in the changing rooms in P.E. or the school canteen for example. He is an avid gamer.

__

Mike is also average height for his age but very skinny with it and hates it. Openly gay and very slightly effeminate he is one of few who knows that his best friend is gay, although not broached the subject he goes on "take one to know one" basis with the obvious signs. Extremely turned on by slightly chubby guys he finds his best friend very attractive but never makes any sort of a move to not to ruin there friendship.

Explore his sexuality in the story...
11.title: Choose your individual!

choices: Order a pizza and stay at Matty's house
Go out with Matty and a few friends
112.content:
Mike and Matty were hanging out at Matty's house like they usually do.

"HONEY," his mother screamed as she approached Mike and Matty, "your father and I are leaving."

"Okay mom, see you guys later."

"And please behave. I don't wont a repeat of what happened the last time we left you alone with a friend."

"That was one time!"

"One time too-"

"Sweetie, lets go." Matty's father said cutting the rest of her sentence short.

"Right, let's go. Bye guys!"

"Bye" both you and Matty say.

As you hear the door slam, you wonder of what the two of you will do. Matty looks so absorbed into the show the two of you were watching. As you think about what to do Matty asks, "Hey, are you getting kind of hungry?"

"Yeah, a little I guess."

"Okay, what do you want to do?" he asks.
112.title: Micheal Smith

choices: Ask Matty about what his mom meant
1121.content:
"Hmm" you ponder. "How about we order a pizza?"

"Dude, that's perfect. Aight, let me go get the number so we can call; I'll be right back."

As you see your best friend run up the stairs, you notice something you hadn't before. Matty's body as he runs up the stairs jiggles a slight bit. All of a sudden your feelings for him hit you like a bus. Your heart aches for how badly you want him. You think that staying in was a good idea so the two of you can bond a little. A thought crosses you mind to get your friend's attention. You decide to try it.


"Hey, man, I got the number," Matty says as he comes down the stairs. "How many pizzas should we order?"

"Two? One for each of us," you reply.

"Good idea. I call them."

You both sit on the couch and wait for your pizza.
1121.title: Order a pizza and stay at Matty's house

choices: Presses pause, goes for that wash.
Ding, Dong - James is here... Already!
114.content:
"ZAYNE!" an exasperated voice called out,

"YES, WHAT IS IT" Zayne responded, slightly annoyed by the repeated calling through his favorite programme.

"COME HERE! I'M GOING"

Zayne sighed and got up and headed toward the hall to see his mum standing at the door with her coat and bag on her arm ready to leave for work. "I'm going now, please... please don't spend all day in front of the TV like last weekend. I'll be back at six-ish like normal, I've left money for lunch on the dining room table"

"Okay, okay, got it. Love Ya" he gave her a quick kiss on the cheek and returned to his tv programme as he herd a clank, the door closing. "aww, geeze". he got up and went to the kitchen to look for a breakfast snack and returned to the lounge with a packet of crisps and went through the sky+ selection looking for previously recorded programmes. After selecting something he dropped his empty packet of crisps and lay down on the sofa to watch it.

A few weeks ago Zayne would have been up and out with his mates skateboarding, but he came down a flight of steps in the shopping centre and fell awkwardly on his wrist spraining it. Although it didn't need a cast his mother took away his skateboard until it got better but despite the fact it was barely hurting Zayne had lost his confidence in skating and wasn't doing it. His days were spend ether watching TV whilst snaking or snaking whilst his mates skated.

Bring, Bring "Eh...." Zayne signed and rolled over pulled his mobile out of his back pajama pocket, it was James his best mate.

"All right mate" he answerer with a lazy strained tone to his voice.

"Zayne, its James, what you up to todayz?"

"Nothin planned"

"Awesome, I'm board too" he chuckled "Wana meet up, in town or...?"

"In town ehhh...." Despite being fit Zayne had always been lazy and unwilling to make long journeys.

"Ha! New you'd say that, too lazy to get off your fat arse I bet."

"Err.... noo he chuckled"

"Fat stomach then" he chuckled, "I bet before you answered the phone you were snacking"

"Er.. well."

"I knew it, I'll come be around in about an hour, you had better be ready"

"Yeah, I will be, see you then dude!" Zayne, pressed the red phone button and slid it down and put it on the coffee table in front of him. He then jogged upstairs to his bed room absent mindedly, he was thinking about what James had said about his fat arse, and then fat stomach; he knew James meant no harm and was only joking, and he was aware that James wasn't completely serious since the last time James saw Zayne's shirtless upper-body was last summer when he was at he peek or his fitness; His body shape had barely changed as all his cloths still fine, and as he ware baggy cloths it wasn't that easy to make an accurate shape assessment of his chest and belly. In truth Zayne had started to put on weight in the past couple of weeks, he pulled of his shirt pushing the comments to one side and dug through his chest of draws for a tee-shirt to wear. He picked a baggy blue one and dropped it to the floor whilst he stripped to his clean underwear before he had a wash; he sat down on his bed and picked up his Xbox controller, getting sidetracked was something Zayne was good at, and selected the game he was playing on last knight as he shunted up hi bed leaning right forward a single belly roll was visible about 3cm over his shirt, although this was leaning right forward.
114.title: Zayne's start.

1141.content:
After a few minuets of gaming Zayne remembered that he was suppose to be getting dressed, he hit the pause button and dropped the controller on the bed side table and stood up and headed towards his en-suite bathroom. Looking into the large mirror above the sink he thought again about something James had said about his "fat stomach", he patted it a couple of times and turned to the side and lent slightly forward and grabbed a small amount of his belly flab and jingled it slightly. 'Oh well' he thought, Its no more than most of his friends, and his abs were just about visible 'I'll work it off' he said to him self.

"Brrrr" he grunted, he rubbed cold water on to his face, as he walked over to the towel rack he looked down ad the scales 'may as well' he thought to him self. Zayne brought his foot around and pulled the scales out and jumped on, 9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 9.3, it rose, and eventually settled 3 lbs above his previous weight at 9 stone 10 lbs. "3lbs of flab", he chuckled. "That'll be easy to work of". He kicked the scales back under the towel rack and returned to his room and pulled his trousers up, his boxers still visiable 2 inches above his baggy jeans.

Zayne then...
1141.title: Presses pause, goes for that wash.

choices: They miss it and have to walk
11412.content:
As Zayne walked toward his shirt at the other end of his double bed he suddenly heard the door bell, as he was at the front of the house he took a look outside and sore a thin 6 foot guy with 2 inch long curly redish/brown hair, it was James. He dashed out of his room down the stairs to the front door and flung it open and jogged back upstairs. "Still getting dressed!, you were quick"

James followed, "no I weren't, i was about an hour like I said", James walked into Zayne's room where he was putting on his belt and lifting his shirt off the floor. "I knew you wouldn't be ready"

"I am, now" Zayne dropped the baggy checkered tee-shirt on and coxed James to flollow him down stairs, at the door he treded into a pair of shoes and shuffled them on whilst going to the dining room to get the money his mum left him, as he got there his shoes were fully on and he grapped the silver £20 and put it in his back pocket and walked to the door where James was standing.

"Ok, the bus is waiting, quick Zayne!"
11412.title: hears the door bell

choices: On the way back to Jame's house
114121.content:
"Phew, we made it." Zayne jokingly wiped his brow as he sat down.

"Come on Zayne, we didn't have to run that far"

"Yeah I know that, ha ha" he said chuckling. "If we get off at the first stop we can go to macky d's, I'm starved"

"Sounds good to me" James, stuck his hands in his pockets and lifted his legs onto the seat.

They just sat in two different sees looking out the window. Apart from the driver they were the only two on the bus, and because no one else was there they both felt it awkward to speak.

After about 10 mins the bus pulled up and a bus stop in the town centre, opposite the Mac Donald's, the two stood up and walked toward the bus door "Cheers"
"Thanks" They said to the bus driver simultaneity as they stept of the bus. At 10:35 the town was just starting to get busy, James dropped his board and rolled toward the traffic lights leaving Zayne to jog to keep up, luckily it red for the traffic letting them cross straight over, James managed to get a 3 meter lead on Zayne and pulled his skateboard up to underneath his arm before Zayne got to the door.

"Alright mate" James said pushing the door open in front of him to reveal a fast food restaurant with only 5 or 6 customers eating and one person queiing up. "I've already had breakfast so I'll just have a milk shake, how bout youz?"

"Naa, I ain't eaten much really this morning, i'm starved" he said looking up at the menu as they got to a vacant check out.

"We will have on vanilla milkshake and a ...." he left the sentence hanging for Zayne to order what he wants,

"Yes, and I'll have Supersized big mac, a large double cheese burger, 2 large fries and a chocolate milkshake" He said taking a long breth as the sentence closed, looking over to James he noticed that despite the large meal he didn't even bat an eye lid.

"Sure sir, are you paying together or seperatily?" the checkout assisant asked.

"Together" James quickly cut in.

"That is 8 pounds 96 then please" the assistant reached forward and took the £20 note from Zayne, and returned a £10 note £1 coin and two 2p coins, after a few minuets of wating she returned with a tray with the large meal on, nowing how clomsy his freind was James took the tray and followed Zayne to a table up near the TV.

James put the tray down in front of Zayne and took the vanilla milkshake and took a seat in the arm chair directly opposite Zayne "Order enough Zayne" he asked sarcastically.

"I was gona say the same to you, geeze only one milkshake, no wonder why your so skinny" Zayne replied with a mouthful of fries, it was true though, James was a couple of inches taller than his best friend but incredibly thin with it.

"I had breakfast before I came out, with the amount your eatin your not gona fit in to those trousers soon, and there suppost to be baggy"

"Oh, James, don't worry, I have a fast metabolism I'll work it off soon enough"
114121.title: Time for some lunch!

choices: "It's cos I exercise and stay in shape"
1141212.content:
The two finished there meal about an hour ago, and they were on the way back to James house, on foot, they both felt it 'necessary' to pop into Tesco and pick up some food as James mum was away for a couple of weeks with his elder sister and father.

"So, wanna stay over tonight Zayne" James asked as he dug into his pocket to lift the keys from his back as James mansion loomed. Both James' parents were in extremely high paying jobs, his Mum a QC, one of the CPS's best lawyer and his father a former civil servant who a couple of years previous gained a seat in the house of lords and was made the governments non elected defense security. James was the black sheep of the family, his sister away with there parents looking around Oxford University after visiting Cambridge earlier in the week, where as James still in sixth form was considering going to art college instead, as he was not as intelligent as his parents or is elder sister, and art was really his forte.

"Sure" he chuckled, "I forgot how big your house is, was, tis gonna be awesome"

"Na, you didn't" he chuckled, knowning that he had been here dozens possibly hundreds over the 6 or 7 years of there friendship.

As they reached the front door James turned the lock and flug the door open to reveal a large well furnished hall way, the two walked in and Zayne, who knew the way, well, headed toward the kitchin "Help your self, to anything you want mate!" James shouted from the hallway.

"Don't mind if I already have" Zayne chuckled, opening the pantry to reveal bread, cakes, scones and many cheeses, took a slice of the chocolate and drowned it with cream and returned to the hall and headed up one flight of stairs toward James large bedroom where James was sat crossed legged on his king-sized bed loading up his PS3 on his 60 inch HD TV. "Feel free to have what ever from the kitchen Zayne, Mum said that the housekeeper said that if everything ain't eaten by the end of the weekend she's gonna chuck it"

"There's a hell of allot in there James, I don't know how you stay so skinny, I mean If I lived here there would be no way that I would be this slender" he said spooning up the last of cake from his bowl.

James replies:
1141212.title: On the way back to James' house

choices: They sit down to watch the film
11412121.content:
"I do actually eat, quite alot" James replied with an essence of seriousness to his voice, he lifted up his shirt and patted his slender tan body.

"You must weigh not much more than me?" Zayne states raising his pitch to indicate the question.

"Come on Zayne, you must weigh more than Me" James walked away and fetched a digital scale from his bathroom and placed it infront of him self and steped on, the screen held a dash before revealing the '9.5' digit "There we are 9 stone 5 pounds"

"I'm bet I can get lower than that" he slipped his trainers off, obviously thinking or trying to push his last weight check out of his head, the digits eventually revealed '9.11'.

"Eh, that cant be right", he pulled his trousers and shirt off and stept back on, whilst the scales were settling he glanced at James seeing the sarcastic frown he shown toward Zayne, his best friend. '9.10' "Well Stone 9, 10 ain't too bad"

"You know Zayne, your starting to show a little bit of a belly" he gave Zayne a slight push back to his sat down on to James bed to reveal a layer of flab overhanging his boxers.

"What'ch think Jimmy? I'm not that fat" he said jiggling his little layer up and down.

"Well, to be honest. I have no idea why i am so afraid of eating to much" he responded with the ever sarcastic tone, although Zayne detected allot of truth in his voice.

"I'll tell you what" he paused whilst he stood up and walked up to James and lifted his shirt of an dropped it to the ground.

"What...?" James said nervously thinking 'what is he doing' as Zayne, with obviously no sence of privacy unbuttoned James' trousers, which were already sitting almost 2 inches lower than the waist.

"You get rid of all this mess and put on some movie and I'll get some food" Zayne said disappearing from the bed room leaving James confused. Wilst down starts he pulled out 9 cakes from larder and put them on the counter with two plates and knife, he then pulled out 3 unopened packet of cookies, a 30 pack of walkers crisps, a jug of cream and 6 cans of coke and 8 bottles of bear; He looked at he spread on the table wearing nothing but his boxers before he saw a large hamper in the corner of the larder, he put it on the table and loaded all the food and drink into it and carefully, after fetching a couple of glasses, carried it up to James bed room, he could see the film on pause, and James still standing with his arms rapped round his belly in front of his bed.

"So..." James broke the silence.

"There's all this food in the parler that needs eating, lets pig out. It aint gona kill us!"

"Does your mum no your here, by the way?" James asked.

"Yeah, texted her hours ago, now sit, eat and lets enjoy the film.
11412121.title: Lets Eat!

114121212.content:
*2 and a half hours later*

It was now 11 o clock, the two boys lay sprawled in the centre of the room surrounded by the food left, both were extremely bloated.

James looked up at Zayne who after 2 and a half beers looked pretty out of it 'light weight' he thought to him self, with out lifting his head any further he patted his bloated belly, "Zayne! you still awake" he got up, his chest surprisingly fine after eating all he possibly could and prodded Zayne softer bloated belly. Zayne was flat out, James walked over to the lights and flicked them on, he got a good look at his friend and started to feel quite week in the knees, so he walked back over and sat next to Zayne, he started to feel him self getting an erection.so he curled up close to Zayne.

After about 10 minuets geting really tired he felt Zayne slurring, although sitll pissed started grabbing onto James' arm and with a large slurr to his voice muttered out "Jayme, ymes, you arch my friend, i love you dude" James quickly thought it was time for bed to he tipped Zayne forward and wrapped his arms round Zaynes soft bloated belly and started dragging him toward his bed, he was heavy and he dropped him to the ground with a bang. Finally he made the lift and rolled Zayne into his bed and climbed in the opposite site a good distance from where Zayne was sleeping.
114121212.title: 2 and a half hours later...

choices: 9 am wake up, remain in same position
11 am wake up, both on opposite sizes of the beds again
1141212121.content:
It was 3am, Zayne awoke to find him self aside James in James' own bed, the effects of the drinking wore of quickly and let Zayne with nothing more than a slight head ache. 'That was awesome, he thought to him self', he kicked the dovet back slightly to reveal James sleeping on his side away from Zayne. Zayne finding him self incredibly attracted to James wrapped his arms round his mate and started cuddling him and massaging his friends flat, slightly soft belly, Zayne managed to tip James toward him with out waking him, suddenly James subconscious pulls Zayne toward him.

Zayne found this extremely arousing, and tightly wrapped one arm round James back putting it on his bum and holding the other not far out in front stroking James belly, briefly he moved his hand away to pull the covers over them before returning his hand to James bum. Wearily Zayne then pressed his head down next to James's looking into his sleeping face he closed his eyes.
1141212121.title: Cuddling

12.title: Straight

123.content:
It was late at a night, Alex and one of his friends Max. Max is a rather big guy so Alex felt safe around him. They were both walking down the street. Alex has his hands in his pockets with his head down.

" Dude...Whats wrong now dude." Max asks. " Nothing... im just so sick of being skinny. " and thats when max got fed up. " Man this again. cmon." Max grabs Alex by his skinny arm and drags him to a taco bell. " Im tired of you sulking about this... im gonna make you fat if it kills you." " Dont you mean if it kills you?" Alex says with a gesture. " Ur the one eating." replied Max.

Max orders a lot of food. Burrito XLs, Tacos, Chaluppas the works. Alex looks at the food and he began stuffing it in his big mouth. Max is cheering him on. " GO GO GO GO GO!" Alex just shoveled all the food in his rather pretty mouth.

After a while alex flat belly began to round out a little. Max went and got more food. the table is covered in food and Alex is stuffing it all in his face.

About half way through Max began feeding Alex. Alex just laid back rubbing his small but roundish belly. Alex isnt gay but he did like being fed by his friends rather they were male of female. " UGH!? 'Uuuuurrp' 'hicup' uuugh..." Alex face is covered in chilly sauce and his eyes glazed over in a sleepy daze. Alex licks his lips....

125.title: None of these: More!

info.description:
Teenage boys gain weight.

When adding chapters please remember the sense of realism. Meaning:

-No magic
-No vore
-No excessive jumps - ie max of 1-2 lbs per day - no more than 10 lbs a week.
-No immobility

*Please don't go higher than 13 stone (180lbs) - or 200lbs on the taller/muscular characters.

*Gay relationships encouraged/Lesbian stuff is fine if it fits into the story/ Straight relationships encouraged

*No explicit sex scenes - i.e. no full nudity (mentioned, or talked about), foreplay etc is fine as long as (e.g.) underwear remains on.

Above all else, have fun!
